title: BOOK IV THE YELLOW POPPY
content: “But oh, the night! oh! bitter-sweet, oh, sweet! ?O dark, O moon and stars, O ecstasy ?Of darkness! O great mystery of love,— ?In which absorbed, loss, anguish, treason’s self ?Enlarges rapture—as a pebble dropt ?In some full winecup over-brims the wine!” Aurora Leigh.
